item.title: HTML Entities
item.description:
This list of html entities is for reference and testing of entity handling. Name Character HTML (quilt shortcut) Unicode hex (decimal) Description
quot " " \x0022 (34) quotation mark (APL

item.title: \(\LaTeX\) Support
item.description: A list of MathJax \(\LaTeX\) Command examples. These alphabetical examples come from here.

item.title: quilt's markdown syntax
item.description: Quilt uses Python-Markdown as it's markdown interpreter. Besides the base syntax rules of original Markdown, quilt parses extra markdown syntax.

item.title: quilt 0.1.1
item.description:
The syntax for page variable headers changed from json to key: value plaintext. The method follows MultiMarkdown's metadata
key [A-Za-z0-9_-]+ from beginning of line until : value a string per line

item.title: quilt 0.1.0
